bopDomesticForm.AddBOPDomestic_SourceLocation_container: Select your source location from the dropdown.
bopDomesticForm.AddBOPDomestic_BOPCategory_container: Select the BOP category from the dropdown.
bopDomesticForm.addBOPDomestic_categoryToggle: Click here to add a category.
bopDomesticForm.AddBOPDomestic_UOM_container: Select the UOM from the dropdown.
bopDomesticForm.AddBOPDomestic_Plant_container: Select your plant code from the dropdown.
bopDomesticForm.AddBOPDomestic_Customer_container: Select your customer code from the dropdown.
bopDomesticForm.bop_vendor_name_form_zero_based: Select your vendor code from the dropdown.
bopDomesticForm.addBOPDomestic_vendorToggle: Click here to add a vendor.
bopDomesticForm.AddBOPDomestic_EffectiveDate: Select the effective date from the calendar.
bopDomesticForm.AddBOPDomestic_Edit_EffectiveDate: After you've updated the financial data (Basic Rate), make sure to change the effective date accordingly.
bopDomesticForm.AddBOPDomestic_NumberOfPieces: Enter the minimum order quantity here.
bopDomesticForm.AddBOPDomestic_BasicRateBase: Enter the basic rate. The basic price will be auto-calculated.
bopDomesticForm.AddBOPDomestic_Edit_BasicRateBaseCurrenc: Click here to update the basic rate. Also, note that after updating financial data, it's necessary to change the effective date.
bopDomesticForm.addBOPDomestic_condition: Click here to add a condition.
bopDomesticForm.AddBOPDomestic_sendForApproval: Click here to send the BOP for approval.

bopImportForm.AddBOPImport_SourceLocation_container: Select your source location from the dropdown.
bopImportForm.AddBOPImport_BOPCategory_container: Select the BOP category from the dropdown.
bopImportForm.addBOPImport_categoryToggle: Click here to add a category.
bopImportForm.AddBOPImport_UOM_container: Select the UOM from the dropdown.
bopImportForm.AddBOPImport_Plant_container: Select your plant code from the dropdown.
bopImportForm.AddBOPImport_Customer_container: Select your customer code from the dropdown.
bopImportForm.AddBOPImport_BOPVendoreName: Select your vendor code from the dropdown.
bopImportForm.addBOPImport_vendorToggle: Click here to add a vendor.
bopImportForm.AddBOPImport_incoTerms_container: Select inco terms from the dropdown.
bopImportForm.paymentTerm: Select the payment term from the dropdown.
bopImportForm.AddBOPImport_EffectiveDate: Select the effective date from the calendar.
bopImportForm.AddBOPImport_BasicRateSelectedCurrency: Enter basic rate/UOM (currency); basic rate/UOM (INR) will auto-calculate.
bopImportForm.addBOPIMport_sendForApproval: Click here to send the BOP material for approval.
